lines.text: Hang on…
The level-up ritual calls for lighting five candles around a pentagram!
Yeah? I’m not exactly planning to do it myself, kid.
No- I mean, that candle the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> has! It's the ony one with a burnt wick!
The other four- those melted candles on the floor? Their wicks were <c=#FF00FF>never lit!</c>
If they never lit those other four candles, and there’s no other candles lying around…
(...and if the goat’s still alive, come to think of it...)
They couldn’t have completed the ritual! So they couldn’t be level 2!
And that means…
Nothing. It means nothing. Y-you’re- they could have <c=#FF00FF>already been</c> “level 2”!
Just b-because that book had that spell in it… who says they were casting it?
This is all- you can’t prove…
Maybe I can’t prove nothin’, Opal, but it’s paintin’ one heck of a picture.
Ggggh…!
If I were you, I’d get ready to defend yourself to the division tribunal.
Because convincin’ me you weren’t up to anything? That ship’s sailed halfway across the globe.
Y-you…! You can’t do this!
Do what? I ain’t done a thing yet, Whydah.
Except, of course, for my job.
If you want to keep yours, I suggest you do it.
Cooperate. With. The investigation.
I’ll continue cooperating with the investigation. Y-you… can’t prove I’ve been doing anything else.
That’ll have to do.
And if it doesn’t-
Heyyyyyyy, boss! How about we cool our jets a little and finish the job, yeah?
Hm?
O-oh. Right. Back on task.
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Presumptuous… spoiled… smug... piece of garbage…</f>
You talking about me, Whydah?
W-what? No! I was talking about-
I mean, I wasn’t talking about anyone! Y-you didn’t hear anything!
...Riiiiight.
